articles.description: The French driver miraculously survived a crash which saw his car split in half after colliding into a trackside barrier in the opening lap at the Bahrain International Circuit on November 29.
articles.content:
Haas F1 driver Romain Grosjean was able to raise a smile as he insisted he is now '50 per cent back' to full health just 11 days after his horrifying 140mph crash at the Bahrain Grand Prix.
